Package com.exort.dao

Interface ParticipationDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ParticipationDAOImpl
    public interface ParticipationDAO
    This interface determines all operations on the table participation in database
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    NeilKleistGao
    See Also:
    Participation, ParticipationWithContent

      void delete​(java.lang.Integer cid, java.lang.Integer aid)
      This method removes the specified participation object

      This method removes all participation objects linked to some arrangement

      This method removes all participation objects linked to some character

      • find

        Participation find​(java.lang.Integer cid,
                   java.lang.Integer aid)
        This method searches for the unique participation object
        Parameters:
        cid - The character id
        aid - The arrangement id
        Returns:
        The unique participation, or null if it's not found

        Returns:
        The list of arrangements' id

      • findBetween

        java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​ParticipationWithContent>> findBetween​(java.util.Date today)
        This method searches for all participation objects whose date range contains given date
        Parameters:
        today - The given date
        Returns:
        A list including all participation divided by arrangement id
